title: Ticket #4380: Clarify differences between different "dag status" versions
description:
Unfortunately, we have two different versions of "dag status" that have different meanings. Extra unfortunately, they each have a range of values from 0-6, so it's more possible to get them confused.

The two versions are as follows:

  • DagStatus in the node status file
  • $DAG_STATUS as available to PRE and POST scripts, $(DAG_STATUS) as available to node job submit files, dag_status as reported in the metrics file, and DAG_Status as reported to DAGMan's classad.
check_ins: 2014-Jul-24 12:04   Check-in [40748]: edits to clarify DAGMan that dag_status is used in 2 different ways in 2 different contexts #4380 (By Karen Miller )
creator: wenger
